abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32966715, pmid32975412, pmid33030607, pmid32902023, pmid32970476, pmid32939576, pmid33038227, pmid33027281, pmid32934147, pmid32936732, pmid32977363, pmid32998162, pmid32965728, pmid32972320, pmid32960246
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.10.20
